title: S4 Ep48: The Controversial Confrontation: Wednesday, March 17th, 2021

description:
• David Dobrik apologized in a new video after a woman accused a 2018 Vlog Squad member of rape (Insider)

  • Google's new Nest Hub is a smart display that tracks your sleep quality (Mashable)
  • The Most Popular Dog Breeds of 2020 (American Kennel Club)
